text: Paddy Barnes (born 9 April 1987) is an Irish boxer. He got a bronze medal in the 2008 Summer Olympics and the 2012 Summer Olympics. As of 1 May 2013, He was 6th in the world in his division, the men's light flyweight.AIBA World Rankings Men's 46-49kg , accessed 25 May 2013. == References == Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Irish boxers Category:Olympic medalists for Ireland Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Sportspeople from Belfast Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics
title: Paddy Barnes
